Hello, welcome to Barclays Bank. I’m your banking assistant.I understand your concern about security. For your safety, we need to verify your identity to protect your account and ensure we’re only sharing your personal information with you.

Hello, welcome to Barclays Bank. I’m your banking assistant.I understand your concern about security. For your safety, we need to verify your identity to protect your account and ensure we’re only sharing your personal information with you.This helps prevent fraud and keeps your details safe. If you’d like to proceed, please share your 8-digit account number and 6-digit sort code.
